member.name: M:EmmcHaccGen.Program.Main(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates boot files for the Nintendo Switch. Generates Boot01, bcpkg2 and the 120 system save.
member.param: noExfat switch. Add this if you don't want exfat support. Disabled by default
Enable verbose output. Disabled by default
Show info about nca's, like it's titleid and type. Will not generate a firmware folder with this option enabled
Fix incorrect hashes in the source firmware folder. Disabled by default
